description:
Robin and Franky look back on the history of Lucci, Kaku, and the rest of the Cipher Pol agents who forced their way into Egghead. They talk about how the rivalry between the Straw Hats and those Cipher Pol agents evolved since they met in Water Seven.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aufzeichnungen einer Rivalität! – Die Strohhüte und Cipherpol
Innen no Log! Mugiwara no Ichimi to Cipher Pol
Le Log d`un lourd passé. Luffy et son équipage contre le Cipher Pol !
The Log of the Rivalry! The Straw Hats vs. Cipher Pol
因縁の記録[ログ]! 麦わらの一味とCP[サイファーポール]
